Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Quartz Pocket Watch

Matching curb chain. Date display. Swiss parts quartz movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. Chrome finish. 1.61 in. Dia. Since 1990, Charles-Hubert Pans has been a major influence in the United States watch industry. By including both retro and contemporary designs in its line, Charles-Hubert Paris has established a large and loyal following. With its unprecedented Lifetime Warranties, exceptional quality standards and affordable pricing, the future looks very bright for Charles-Hubert Paris.
